name: Gymnastics Training 3D
description:
Try your hand in gymnastics with Gymnastics Training 3D - Sports Arena app.
TRY 10+ UNIQUE EXERCISES;
CHOOSE ONE OF 2 HQ CHARACTERS;
PRACTICE IN ALL 4 SPORTS EQUIPMENTS;
WATCH HIGH-QUALITY SPORT STUNTS.

Gymnastics Training 3D - Sports Arena is an IMPROVED version of gymnastics simulator with new animations, interactions and controls.

10+ UNIQUE EXERCISES:
Practise all exercises and show them on the championship

2 HQ CHARACTERS:
Choose a sportsman or a sportswoman

4 SPORTS EQUIPMENTS:
- Pommel horse
- Parallel bar
- Rings
- Practice beam

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Gymnastics Training 3D - Sports Arena
KEY FEATURES:

• Realistic 3D GYM with all sports equipments

• 2 different REACTIONS on success and fail

• 3 amazing EXERCISES for each equipment
